languages.text: "Формально Фалько никак не связан с Пощадой — он просто преуспевающий агент Миссии, такой же, как и Джай, и... другие. Но он рад делать для Пощады грязную работу, а потому пользуется некоторыми преференциями".

"Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."
languages.original_text: "Формально Фалько никак не связан с Пощадой — он просто преуспевающий агент Миссии, такой же, как и Джай, и... другие. Но он рад делать для Пощады грязную работу, а потому пользуется некоторыми преференциями".

traits.locale_text: "Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: “法尔科和悯慈明面上没什么联系。法尔科不过是犯罪集团里其中一位出色的代理人，就像婕伊……和很多其他人一样。不过，法尔科很乐意替悯慈干脏活，因此也得到了特别的优待。”
languages.original_text: "Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."

traits.locale_text: “法尔科和悯慈明面上没什么联系。法尔科不过是犯罪集团里其中一位出色的代理人，就像婕伊……和很多其他人一样。不过，法尔科很乐意替悯慈干脏活，因此也得到了特别的优待。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: 「ファルコとマーシーは表向きには、つながっていません。ファルコはジェイや他の人たちと同じように、聖務団のエージェントとして成功しているだけ。ですが、ファルコはマーシーの汚れ仕事を喜んで引き受け、だからこそ優遇されている」
languages.original_text: "Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."

traits.locale_text: 「ファルコとマーシーは表向きには、つながっていません。ファルコはジェイや他の人たちと同じように、聖務団のエージェントとして成功しているだけ。ですが、ファルコはマーシーの汚れ仕事を喜んで引き受け、だからこそ優遇されている」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: «Entre Falco y Mercy no hay ninguna relación oficial. Falco es otro agente próspero de la misión, igual que Jae y que... bueno, otros. Pero Falco le hace el trabajo sucio a Mercy y por eso recibe trato de favor».
languages.original_text: "Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."

traits.locale_text: «Entre Falco y Mercy no hay ninguna relación oficial. Falco es otro agente próspero de la misión, igual que Jae y que... bueno, otros. Pero Falco le hace el trabajo sucio a Mercy y por eso recibe trato de favor».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: « Falco et Mercy ne travaillent pas officiellement ensemble ; Falco n'est qu'un agent de la Mission qui a su tirer son épingle du jeu, comme Jae et... d'autres. Mais il est toujours prêt à faire le sale boulot de Mercy et c'est pour ça qu'il a droit à un traitement de faveur. »
languages.original_text: "Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."

traits.locale_text: « Falco et Mercy ne travaillent pas officiellement ensemble ; Falco n'est qu'un agent de la Mission qui a su tirer son épingle du jeu, comme Jae et... d'autres. Mais il est toujours prêt à faire le sale boulot de Mercy et c'est pour ça qu'il a droit à un traitement de faveur. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "Offiziell haben Falco und Mercy keine Verbindung zueinander – Falco ist bloß ein weiterer reicher Agent der Mission, so wie Jae und ... andere Leute. Aber Falco erledigt gerne die Drecksarbeit für Mercy und erhält deshalb eine Vorzugsbehandlung."
languages.original_text: "Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."

traits.locale_text: "Offiziell haben Falco und Mercy keine Verbindung zueinander – Falco ist bloß ein weiterer reicher Agent der Mission, so wie Jae und ... andere Leute. Aber Falco erledigt gerne die Drecksarbeit für Mercy und erhält deshalb eine Vorzugsbehandlung."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "Falco ve Merhamet, resmî olarak bağlantılı değil. Falco, Jae ve... Diğerleri gibi varlıklı bir Misyon ajanı, o kadar. Ancak Merhamet'in pis işlerini yapmaktan gayet memnun ve bu yüzden de özel muamele görüyor."
languages.original_text: "Falco and Mercy aren't officially connected — Falco's just another prosperous Mission agent like Jae and... other people. But Falco's happy to do Mercy's dirty work for him, and that's why he gets preferential treatment."

traits.locale_text: "Falco ve Merhamet resmî olarak bağlantılı değil, Falco, Jae ve... Diğerleri gibi varlıklı bir Misyon ajanı yalnızca. Ama Falco, Merhamet'in pis işlerini yapmaktan gayet memnun ve bu yüzden de özel muamele görüyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana
